createImage.description: Generate an image from a text prompt using any available model

props.name: prompt
props.description: Text prompt describing the image you want to generate

props.name: quality
props.description: Image quality (not all models support this)

props.name: size
props.description: Image size (e.g., 1024x1024). Use "auto" for default size.

props.name: responseFormat
props.description: How to receive the generated image

imageToImage.description: Generate or edit images using input image(s) with optional mask

props.name: prompt
props.description: Text prompt describing the image transformation

props.name: images
props.description: Input image(s) for editing (up to 16 images)

props.name: masks
props.description: Mask file(s) to specify areas to edit (some models require this)

props.name: quality
props.description: Image quality (not all models support this)

props.name: size
props.description: Image size (e.g., 1024x1024). Use "auto" for default size.

props.name: responseFormat
props.description: How to receive the generated image
